docs.title: Horrible Customer Service!
docs.text: m rebate shows it mailed on jan 13 but i've received nothing! i've called customer service 5 times in the last 2 weeks and have held in excess of 2 hours each time. today i was finally able to reach someone after holding for 29:49. they forgot to add my apartment number to the address... really? ugh! then the agent provided me with an invalid card number and advised me she would be transferring me to someone else who can cancel my original card and send out a new one. well the agent provided me incorrect info! thankfully the agent she transferred me to was very helpful and able to edit my info and send out a replacement card. ugh! i paid over $900 to switch to wwireless and i'm only being reimbursed for $220. all i can say is stay on top of them, it's annoying and time consuming but atleast you'll get some money back! i now have to wait 21 days for th replacement card!

docs.title: changing to a different ulimited plan
docs.text: bought a gs7 edge and got 1 for free, if i change to the new ulimited plan will i still get a credit for the payment of the phone.

docs.title: No credit for my iPhone 6 to iPhone 7 Plus upgrade even after multiple calls and promises!!!
docs.text: was sent an email about my eligibility to get $650 credit if i traded in my iphone 6 and upgraded to any iphone 7 model in september. i read the eligibility details carefully, followed the instructions precisely, and did it all through the link provided in my email. i got my new phone in the mail, and proceeded to send in my previous phone. i discovered in early january that my account had not reflected this and i was paying new monthly device charges. i've talked to people in customer care three different times, and each time they first assume that i'm wrong and ask me the same darn questions, which is infuriating to do so since the notes from my previous complaints are on file, and it takes 30-45 minutes each time! the second time i called the representative said they'd issue my a $25 in good faith credit to my account, nice gesture but that hasn't happened yet either! just got my new bill, here it is march 1st, and still no credit for the trade in, no good faith credit, and i'm paying full price for the new phone! this happened last time i traded in with wwireless, however, though late and it taking me to catch the error, you all fixed it in decent time. nothin has happened! i was told previously that it would be handled within the week (mid january). then when i called again in early february, i got someone who wanted to ask me to go through every detail again, and assumed that i messed up ("oh, yeah, it looks like we received your iphone 6...your account is in good standing...you did it in the promotion window); duh! any help or advice? i'm pinching pennies these days and saving $30/month on my bill that i anticipated would help immensely!

docs.title: How to download ringtones to Cingular Flip?

docs.title: Galaxy Express 3 (J120A). Galaxy App gives error (2300:1004). Can't update phone to current ver.
docs.text: id a factory reset. went through setup process. updated google apps. tried to open the samsung galaxy app and it said"this device does not support samsung galaxy apps. check available devices on the samsung apps website. (2300:1004)". searched on google and found that i need to update the phone's software. current version isj120aucu2apj2 and i need to update to j120aucs2aqb1. i can't. went to settings/abou phone/system updates and searched for an update but it says i'm up to date which is incorrect.j120aucu2apj2 is the nov. 8, 2016 update (mine says oct. 1, 2016) and the new update j120aucs2aqb1 is the jan. 1, 2017 update. can you help me update the phone? can you just send me the j120aucs2aqb1 firmware file and i'll update it manually myself? i searched the net but can't find the latest firmware anywhere. i could update the phone myself in 5 minutes. can you help?

docs.title: Customer Service
docs.text: have just spent an hour on chat and on the phone and on hold for 10 minutes at a time to not get help. i asked for a customer service number and was told that i could not have one. that i would have to be transferred. you guessed it -- i was put on hold. i was given incorrect information repeatedly. at the end of the discussion, i was told to go get information from samsung. your customer support staff has to be the most poorly trained in history. it is certainly the worst of my experience.i would like a phone number and an email address to report this issue in a more formal manner.

docs.title: Unlimited Plus with Wireless Home Phone and Internet and data consumption limits
docs.text: have to usewireless home phone and internet for my home internet as there are no other connection options (except for wireles competitors)the new unlimited plus plan looks like a decent option, but i am concerned about the 22gb limit for deprioritization. does it apply to all lines or just smartphones? there are clear exceptions for the tethering data caponthewireless home phone and internet device, but nothing is said regarding the 22gb deprioritization limit.this is important because the tower i connect to is very congested.i already feel depriotitized several nights per week because i can barely do anything thanks to this congestion problem. (the congestion actually seems to be related to the unlimited plans wwireless has been offering already, as before the first one was introduced, i rarely had less than 12 mbps both up and down). yet, this device still usually uses 25+ gb/mo, thanks to daytime use.all of my lte devices are affected by the congestion, even those that use much less than 1gb/mo.if the deprioritization threshold applies to wireless home phone and internet, it could be very difficult to tell the difference between slowdowns that are due to going over that threshold (my fault) or the congested tower (wwireless's fault).ps - a couple trees on my property blew down in a recent storm. there may be room to "plant" a new one.solved!go to solution.

docs.title: Cancelled-  could not confirm identity?
docs.text: hlloi tried to purchase 2 iphone 7 plus and port over to wwireless. all was successful and even did it with a rep while online. then next day received a email saying could not confirm identity? really? i did this online to avoid the store. i shouldn't have to go to the store.

docs.title: AT&T upset customer billing
docs.text: hllo,i have been overcharged every month and charged for services i did not request. i have called every month and after about 3 hours , i'm told credits will be issued along with a visa card with credit on it for a 100 for my troubles. this started in june 2016. i have kept all and documents everything. i have filed two dispute cases with any response back. last month i finally spoke with a girl named bridget whom i went through every statement with her and provided where over charged and together agreed on a credit due each month. when finalizing the total balance it came to $1600.44. she said she needed to get approval and would be back on the line soon. when she returned to our line connection, she stated that the credit was approved and she was applying it right now and i should see it on the next billing cycle. i waited for the next billing cycle and i was charged the $300 plus for two lines and wsatellite. i have two lines and contracted with wwireless u-verse that my month charges would be...$106.47 for unlimited everything for two lines and $60.00 for direct tv. on the second case filed i spoke with a girl whom seem genuinely concerned. she was able to give me some credit for the direct tv but in the system there was nothing showing i even talked to bridget resulting in filing a case again and ask to pull the call. so much more i could say. this was on 2-19-2017 and was told it would be resolved no later than ten days. still have not heard a thing but received phone call stating my bill was past due. after posting my last message i received a letter from wwireless stating that my post violated the guide so so they deleted my message along with them shutting my service .

docs.title: Waiting on a credit
docs.text: spoke with 3 different departments, over a 2 hour period, about 2 weeks ago about my acct, after they reviewed all the notes....i was told, i would receive a large credit within the next 5-7 days! also, i didn't need to make payment because the credit would exceed the balance, so the pending payment was reduced to $1 by the wwireless representative. i only see a $25 "sorry for the inconvenience" credit. please advise when credit will be posted & will this cause my service to be disconnected?

docs.title: System Update
docs.text: m phone just recently did a system update. i do not like it at all. how can i go back to the way it was with the previous version?

docs.title: I feel cheated by AT&T, once again.
docs.text: esterday i received an email of wwireless's new package deals for unlimited data. i called to ask more about this, since i've been thinking about switching to straight talk, and i figured it was worth hearing about. i was speaking with a woman (who of course, was hard to understand), and i told her that i was wondering about the package deals. she told me that, in order to receive this deal, i would have to sign another contract. i told her that i did not want to enter another contract with wwireless, because i have been charged hidden fees in the past, and because i was still considering leaving wwireless for straight talk. she then offered me an iphone 7, free of charge, and a $200 visa card, if i decided to stay with wwireless. i agreed, and i told her that my mother was interested in knowing about the plan (we share a family plan). she spoke to my mom, and ended up only offering a $100 visa card. i feel that she did this because my mom was easier to persuade. when they hung up together, i asked my mom about the free phone. my mom said that the woman never said anything about a phone. this is when i got angry. so i called wwireless again. the man on the line told me that the deal for a free phone expired in october last year. he told me that i would have to order another line to my family plan in order to get another phone, which is not what the woman before him told me. i asked to speak with his manager, and was told that his manager would call me back in 10-15 minutes. i never received a call back from them. i am very angry, and unless this issue is resolved, i will not be continuing my service with wwireless. i am sick of being tricked and lied to by this company.

docs.title: Insurance deductible
docs.text: n december 12, 2016, i spoke to customer service representative, roxanne in regarding access to my wwireless online account to pay my phone, cellphone and internet bills. all of my account information: bank information, user name and password was somehow deleted, when wwireless updated their website -- at least that is what i was told by roxanne.i also had issues with using my samsung cellphone: i was not able to hear family or friends, or it sounded like they were speaking under water. a new samsung slide cellphone was sent to me around 01/04/2016 by wwireless , as i have insurance on my cellphone. i paid $92.00 on my bill with the representative; i have the confirmation #.on january 12, 2017, i had to go to the local wwireless store#0450 to make my bill payment, as i could not access my wwireless online account -- it would still would not allow payments online.on february 5, 2017, linda kay called me at my home phone to see how things were going -- if i had received my new samsung slide cellphone, and the issues i had with logging on the wwireless website. she wanted to know if everything was going fine and anything you can do to make my service better. i told the website was still an issue and she walked me through setting up my account again to pay my bills. the new samsung slide cellphone was received around 01/04/2016 and i had no further issues with the new cellphone since december 12th, 2016. linda kay was happy to hear and told me you would waive the insurance deductible, as i had so many issues, leaving a balance of $92.00, and have a confirmation #.i received my new bill on february 27, 2017, with a balance of $136.65, including the insurance deductible of $43.92, plus $6.50 in late fee. i have tried for the past three days to call the combined billing department to get a correction and adjustment. i have reached india; they in turn have transferred me to directtv, wireless internet, wireless home phone, retention department, but never combined billing department. the beginning prompts when you call 800-288-2020, gets you to india and they do not transfer to the correct department or they disconnect the calls. i have been on the phone from 22 mins up to 35 mins, waiting for someone to come on the phone. i have asked for supervisors to get this corrected; consumer representatives just put you on hold, disconnect the call or to the supervisor of a wrong department.i went to the local wwireless store#0450 to see if the manager/supervisor could help me -- unfortunately the store could not help. i would like someone to call to resolve this issue regarding the insurance deductible and late fee. i have been a loyal customer for over 40 years. i do not feel i have to continue to call for over three days to get the correct department. i am to the point of just finding another service as i need a good and dependable.by the way, wwireless representive advised me the new samsung slide cellphone is being discontinued, so wwireless sent me a samsung j3 two weeks ago. now wwireless is trying to charge me more monthly -- wwireless says i am going over my usage as i only have 300mb, whatever that is. i use my cellphone for phone calls and texting only. i do not go on the internet.

docs.title: paying bill from abroad
docs.text: ear wwireless, i am a foreign customer and evry month i stumble on problems paying my bill or logging into my account. first, wwireless has confirmed that there are firewall problems to be solved so that i can always properly log in to my account from abroad. this was nearly a year ago. at the moment i cannot login to my account, again. another way to pay is not possible, via phone is not possible because that does not work when one is not in the us. i could call an operator and fix it, this will take over an hour by experience, but then i will not get an invoice for the bill nor can i check the costs, this is a business account. once again i'm asking, no begging, wwireless, please help me in paying my bill! after all, i just want to pay my bill. please note that this is something that happens nearly every month when it's time payiong the bill. so please sort it out, this has been going on for nearly 1 whole year.

docs.title: ATT -Cricket take over is a Google nightmare
docs.text: 've had the same number for years. as such, it is my recovery number for my google account. when i got the notice from google to verify my account update after a change, even though i gave all the correct info, i can not get access my account because cricket recently blocked shortcodes after the wwireless take over. there was never an alert of the upcoming change so there was no chance to change my account verification option to phone call or backup email. }:- [i called and verified my phone, my id, and the issue to the cricket rep, but they won't even unblock the shortcodes from google temporarily because "it's the new policy" sooo wwireless has effectively blocked me from my emails, my contacts, my bank alerts, and who knows what else.i've been online trying to get tech support, looking for help in forums, googling for help, sending requests for reset help, leaving "did this answer your questions" or "did this fix your issue" responses day and night day in and day out for over a week and i keep getting the run around. not once have i gotten a human who can help or even respnd.i've left so many requests for help in so many places i can't keep track so i've even resorted to giving the new account *blkgitana2@gmail* out in public forums in the hopes that someone/anyone responds. (it doesn't mwwirelesser as the new account isn't linked to, and can not be linked to, anything the original account was.)very frustrating!!

docs.title: Grandfathered Unlimited Plan and unlocked phones

docs.title: UNLOCK PHONES
docs.text: o whom it may concern,why is it taking over two weeks to unlock 5 of our phones (whichwe own all of them) and we have no contract, but wwireless representatives continously states that it is processing? we've unlocked all of our phones online, via link on phone, and over the phone with customer service. by law if the customer owns a phone and does not have an active contract with the carrier, the carrier has to unlock the cell phone because the customer owns the phone. i've unlocked multiples phones with wwireless and it has literally taken an average of 48 hours (2 days) and i've been with wwireless for over 5 years. is the process taking a long time to unlock all 5 phones because of the fact that we dropped wwireless as the cell provider and chose t-mobile as our new cell carrier? this process is very frustrating and this issue reinforces why i chose to go with t-mobile. v/rchris

docs.title: Voice HD, FaceTime, and Personal Hotspot on IPhone GoPhone Plan
docs.text: just bought a iphone 6s today at a local wwireless store after my iphone 6 was destroyed beyond repair. the guy working there switched my phone number from my 6 sim card to my 6s sim card (i told him not to at first because i already had a working sim card but he said it wouldn't mwwirelesser). so the new sim card is in my phone and everything is working perfectly. i decide to turn the phone off and when i turn it back on, the hotspot and facetime is gone in my settings. it says "set up personal hotspot" and "set up facetime". someone called me soon after i saw this and the person i was talking to could barely hear me (it wasn't just that problem with one person. i called several people and got the same results). when i clicked on to set up hotspot or facetime, it says to call wwireless and i did. the guy i spoke to said everything was fine on his side and recommended i talk to someone at apple. i did a live chat with someone from apple and the only advice she gave me was to update my phone (which i did, same results). i just want to know how to fix the problem before i decide to just return to phone

docs.title: Iphone 7 promotion not granted
docs.text: switched to wsatellite because i was promised by an wwireless representative that i can still avail of the promotion even though i already have iphone 7 prior to switching. i've been waiting for 3 months now and still no credit is being applied. when i called them, now they are telling me that i cannot avail of the promotion anymore because i had the iphone already prior to switching. when i explained to them that the only reason i switched to direct tv was to avail of the free iphone, all they say is they cannot help me. i was giventhe information by their customer representative and they cannot do anything about it because there is no written documentation provided. i've been with wwireless for a long time now and trusted their words over the phone and now they are telling me that i cannot trust what i'm being told. this is very frustrating! one of the managers i talked to even yelled at me for waiting on me to provide the account number. i've never had this terrible experience with wwireless. i hope somebody from the corporate department reads this and be able to help. i would have cancelled both wwireless and direct tv right away if only i dont have to pay the cancellation fee,that's how frustrated i am. if they cant give me what they promised, i hope they let me cancel my accounts without charging for early termination fee.

docs.title: Rude Customer Service/ DATA Use
docs.text: h, i'd like to ask what the point of customer service is? i had a conversation with a "ryan t" on 2/22 where he stated that wwireless would be covering the overage cost on my next bill. however to my surprise, there the $15 charge was on my new bill, causing me to take more of my time to contact wwireless again to correct ryan t's negligence (jose was very helpful with this, though). he not only avoided my question, but was even rude to me while trying to get me to "buy in" to an alternative plan still with no answer to my original question, to the point that i felt a need to apologize to him please see the examples from my chat with ryan t below. i hope that something will be done concerning this type of service toward long-term customers such as myself.chat: 2/21/17:ryan t : jessica, as far as that goes until we pinpoint the issue and the cause, it will keep happening. i can credit you for an overage but i highly recommend switching to a plan with no overage fees in the meantime....jessica : okay, so to clarify- wwireless will be covering the (2) $15 overage fees i'm sure i will have on my next bill?ryan t : yes.jessica : i guess i don't see the point in why i have to change my plan because wwireless is using data when data shouldn't be being used? i just don't get it... but i trust that you know the best way to rectify the situation.ryan t : jessica, the point is we can only credit you so much. if you keep wracking up overage fees and refuse to take the proactive step of changing your plan we won't be able to keep crediting you. you say it is an wwireless issue and maybe it is but maybe it isn't and you can always change back to your old plan after this issue and whatever its cause is resolved.jessica : i understand that, i'm not trying to be a nuisance, so i apologize, but i am just trying to understand how this data is only being used now when it wasn't before. i also do not want to keep having this issue, and would like to resolve it as well. if you think going to no-overage plan is a good idea then ok. however, i don't want to be in a situation next month where i "run out" of data because of these new data uses

docs.title: Terrible Outsourced Customer Service!
docs.text: (wwreless has officially answered me with this issue. i will share their response with you at the end of this post.) on the evening of february 17th, i used the mywwireless app to pay my bill. i rarely use the app, but i liked the option of paying my bill in 2 manageable portions on my galaxy s5. my original plan was to pay $150 that evening, then the balance of $289.03 the following week. i was using my home's wi-fi and my phone has always been reliable, but at a crucial moment during the transaction, the app momentarily froze, disappeared then reappeared showing 2 separate payments being made in the amount of $489.03 plus the $150.00! i immediately went to my bank account and saw the 2 pending payments, placing my account in the red. i called cs and was reassured that the 439.03 would be reversed in 24 hours. since it was a friday night and the banks would be closed on monday due to a federal holiday, i figured everything would be okay. boy, was i wrong. 24 hours later, the 439.03 was still on hold in my account. i spoke with another overseas cs rep and found out that the first guy placed 439.03 on hold until the next saturday, even though my remaining balance was only 289.03. fixed now, right? nope. i think i talked to every wwireless rep in india every day for a week, trying to get this 'hold' removed. i spent countless hours on hold, being transferred, being disconnected, told "it's fixed" or being hung up on by some rude supervisor with marginal english skills and an innocuous name like 'carl' or 'shirley'. my problem was that wwireless's hold on this money was causing overdraft fees to amass with every scheduled transaction. i couldn't just stop or suspend my car insurance or rental insurance payments and i believed what i was told by wwireless india. starting on friday the 17th until wednesday the 22nd, i was repeatedly reassured that the hold amount would be removed from my bank account, even though my bank stated that wwireless placed a 'hold' on the funds until the 23rd. for 1 week, i was a sole-income, single working parent who couldn't purchase groceries or gas. had cs been straight with me from the get-go and told me that my funds might be on hiatus for up to 10 business days, i could've gotten a payday loan on saturday morning, made a deposit and avoided all the od fees. nope, i got the broken english runaround, instead.i did plead my case to wwireless on their facebook page. my answer from scott: any refunded amount can take 7 to 10 business days. you should have been aware of that. the od fees are not our responsibility. sorry. oh, please fill out this consumer satisfaction survey.... just kidding. we deleted the link after sending it to you. wouldn't want a bad review. thanks for using wwireless!actually, i think wwireless's third world employees should know about the 7 to 10 day thing. i'm just one of the nameless, faceless working poor who have zero representation, yet contribute to wwireless's 13 billion in profits. my bank is a little richer, too. i'd switch internet and phone carriers, but i can't afford to. funny how they can take money in real time, yet sit on a refund for a week.
